description: The SERVICE_PLAN table contains high-level information about service plans. Most workflow-related information in PLN is overtime and found in the SERVICE_PLAN_VERSION table.

columns.name: SERVICE_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the service plan record.

columns.name: RECORD_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the record status (hidden, soft-deleted, etc...). Category values are stored in table ZC_RECORD_STATUS_2.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Soft Deleted


Hidden


Hidden and Soft Deleted

columns.name: COMMENT_NOTE_ID
columns.description: The note record that contains comments for all versions of the service plan.

columns.name: RECORD_CREATION_DATE
columns.description: Stores the date the record was created

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The ID of the patient to whom this plan belongs. This value is populated for plans associated with a Compass Rose episode.
